message.body: Hi. So I just realized you may not recognize this number. My old phone died and I got a new line and number. This is cricket. Should you ever care to reach me this is my new permanent number. I have to say I am angry and sad and disappointed in how you ha
How would like to get your shirts back?

It was Sequoia's BatMitzvah...a major once in a lifetime event...an event you were slated to participate in as her father figure...you didn't even call. Put yourself in my shoes for a moment...explain to your daughter why a person she was willing and hopi
Can you leave them in a bag on your front step tomorrow morning?
I understand what you're saying. I would be happy to apologize to them.
